title: How first-time director behind 'Truth' got Oscar winners in his cast
text:
Published By: USATODAY.com: Movies - Today 
Director James Vanderbilt's movie about '60 Minutes' producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather stars Cate Blanchett and Robert Redford....
